titles: A sermon preached (May 16. 1680.) at the funeral of Mr Tho. Gilson, late minister of the Gospel. By Samuel Slater, minister of the Gospel.
author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.
publisher: printed for Tho. Cockeril at the Three Legs in the Poultrey, over-against the Stocks-Market,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
